main event: An unidentified gray object was observed hovering at Ladd AFB, Alaska on 25 February 1951, emitting a puff of white smoke before proceeding west at a high speed.
interesting points: The object hovered for 4-5 seconds before emitting smoke., It was reported by multiple military personnel from Ladd AFB., The object's behavior was described as unlike any known aircraft., Several officers observed the object over a period of 12-15 minutes., The investigation concluded that the object was unmanned and classified as UNIDENTIFIED.
